item.title: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，去年日本婴儿出生人数连续第八年下降，这是日本自 1899 年开始统计以来出生人数最低的一年。
item.description:
The number of babies born in Japan last year fell for an eighth straight year, government data showed Tuesday — the lowest number of births since the country began compiling the statistics in 1899. https://t.co/Wc9EQjNs4p

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.description:
Don Henley resumed testifying Tuesday in a trial over handwritten drafts of lyrics to some of the Eagles' biggest hits, including "Hotel California," and his decade-long effort to reclaim the pages. https://t.co/KE9RXB9x2i

item.title: 梦想去火星？美国国家航空航天局（NASA）正在地球上为志愿者提供另一个世界的体验，参与者在那里吃、住、交流，就像在 2 亿多英里以外的太空中一样。
item.description:
Dream of going to Mars?

NASA is offering volunteers an otherworldly experience here on Earth, where participants eat, live and communicate as if they were over 200 million miles away in space. https://t.co/VkQkNeh5Uf pic.twitter.com/W74pcyzYCM

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 如果您观看了 Lifetime 周末首播的温迪-威廉姆斯（Wendy Williams）专题片并感到不安，那么您并不孤单。纪录片制作人说，他们在拍摄时并不知道威廉姆斯患有痴呆症，而公众上周才知道。
item.description:
If you watched Lifetime's Wendy Williams docuseries that premiered over the weekend and felt uneasy, you weren't alone.

item.title: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周二表示，该公司将在未来三年内关闭 150 家效益不佳的门店，其中包括在 2024 年底前关闭 50 家门店。梅西百货是在公布第四季度亏损和销售额下降后关闭门店的。
item.description:
Macy's will close 150 unproductive stores over the next three years, including 50 by the end of 2024, the department store operator said Tuesday.

The closures come after the company posted a fourth-quarter loss and declining sales. https://t.co/qWpve4nXGD pic.twitter.com/oWlKwaAWpd

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 手机对当今美国青少年的影响有目共睹。现在，越来越多的州和联邦领导人开始支持学校禁止使用手机，并提出了限制使用手机的新方法。
item.description:
The hold that phones have on adolescents in America today is well-documented. Now a growing number of leaders at the state and federal levels have begun endorsing school cellphone bans and suggesting new ways to curb access to the devices. https://t.co/18JW2wBqE8 pic.twitter.com/3MfURrYNia

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在这一天：1922 年，最高法院在 Leser 诉 Garnett 案中一致支持宪法第 19 修正案，该修正案保障了妇女的选举权。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1922 the Supreme Court, in Leser v. Garnett, unanimously upheld the 19th Amendment to the Constitution, which guaranteed the right of women to vote. https://t.co/1Lfd5NzmKC pic.twitter.com/q8v86t58Zq

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 何塞-贝兹（Jose Baez）律师在接受 ABC 新闻独家采访时说，圣约翰斯县治安官办公室对他的当事人维尔吉利奥-阿吉拉尔-门德斯（Virgilio Aguilar Mendez）实施了 "非法逮捕"，警方最初接触他的原因是种族貌相。
item.description:
Speaking exclusively with ABC News, Attorney Jose Baez said the St. Johns County Sheriff's Office conducted an "unlawful arrest" of his client, Virgilio Aguilar Mendez, and that racial profiling was the reason he was initially approached by police.https://t.co/QJPAIcIHZ5

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024
